Log in Get Demo

# Meet Verkada Guest

Welcome guests with our visitor management system that integrates seamlessly
with video security and access control.

Start a Free Trial

Please enter a valid email.

## Watch Instant Demo

Experience Verkada Guest, our visitor management solution, at no cost to you.
Set up the system in minutes and start checking in visitors to your sites.

Start Trial

## Strengthen Security while Simplifying Visitor Management

Incorporate visitor management into your physical security measures - all
within a single pane of glass.

  * ### 

Make guests feel welcome

Sign-in via an email invite, ipad kiosk or QR code. Guests simply follow the
flow to check in, and hosts are instantly notified to greet them.

  * ### 

Customize to suit your needs

Your needs are unique. From branding to custom sign-in flows and document
types, admins can customize the experience in minutes.

  * ### 

Centrally manage the security of visitors and employees

Built upon the Verkada security platform and integrated across the product
stack, admins can manage guest logs, review video footage and remotely unlock
doors - all from the Command platform.

  * ### 

Protect students with additional screening

Instantly screen visitor information against a national sex offender database.
Deny entry and alert relevant staff to those who pose a risk.

Learn More

Read Overview

## Streamline check-in and protect patients with Guest for Healthcare

Harness the power of Verkada Guest with a tailored user experience for
healthcare. Screen visitors instantly against criminal databases and
approve/deny lists. Simplify front desk operations with EMR integration,
enforce visitation limits and keep track of visitors— all in a single view.

Integrate with EMR Systems

Screen visitors instantly

Enforce visitor limits

Maintain HIPAA compliance

Read Overview

## Key Features

All the features you need to welcome visitors and maintain visibility and
control of your building’s security.

  * Integrate with Verkada Cameras & Access Control

  * Role-based permissions

  * Customizable visitor experience

  * Touchless check-in

  * Calendar invitations

  * Document signing

  * Badge printing

  * Automatic arrival notifications

  * Analytics and reporting

  * Security Screening

Learn More

## Try Verkada Guest for Free

30-day trial includes full access to Verkada Workplace, which includes both
visitor and mailroom management solutions.

Start a Free Trial
